option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Quick Fix for IDE Errors
The red errors in `SoundManager.java` are just IntelliJ's cache being out of date.
## ⚡ Quick Fix (30 seconds)
1. Click **Maven** tab (right side of IDE) 2. Click **Reload All Maven Projects** button (top-left of Maven panel) 3. Wait 30 seconds 4. Errors disappear ✅
## Already Done ✅ - pom.xml has javafx-media dependency - Maven downloaded javafx-media-21.0.6-win.jar - Project compiles successfully (BUILD SUCCESS)
## Just Need - IntelliJ to refresh its cache
That's it! Simple Maven reload fixes everything.
